wikipedia_page.main: Mark Waite is an English retired football midfielder who has spent his entire playing and coaching career in the United States. He is the son of John Waite.

response: Team Shaklee was an American pro cycling team from 1987 to 2000. The team director was Frank Scioscia, and riders included Eric Wohlberg, Chris Coletta, John Stenner, John Frey, Mark Waite, and Kent Bostick. In 1988, the team won the team time trial title at the U.S. National Cycling Championships.
